Class-Witch 20 -- Female Versatile Human Witch: 20
Strength: +4 Dexterity: +5 Constitution: +4 Intelligence: +4 Wisdom: +4 Charisma: +3
Background: Detective Deity: Pharasma
Experience: 19339/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 30 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 10/15
Attribute Notes:

Witch Skills: Skill Trained (Choose 7 from any)
Cauldron: Knows the formulas for 13 common oils or potions and can use Craft to create 6 oils or potions during daily prep
Courtly Graces: Can use Society to impersonate a noble or to Make An Impression on one
Dubious Knowledge: Normal failure on a Recall Knowledge check yields a mix of true and false information
Familiar's Language: Can speak with animals in the same family as familiar
Legendary Professional: Improves NPCs' attitude by 1 step for those with ranks in Society/Increases the job level when Earning Income using Lore
Oddity Identification: +2 Occultism to Identify Magic with a fortune, mental, possession, prediction, or scrying trait
Read Lips: Can read the lips of those who can be seen clearly; in difficult circumstances, this requires a Society check and can inflict fascinated and off-guard on self
Schooled In Secrets: Can use Occultism to Gather Information about secret societies and to Impersonate a member
Sense Allies: R60' Willing undetected allies are hidden instead and can be targeted with a DC 5 flat check
Sign Language: Knows the sign equivalents of understood languages
Streetwise: Can use Society to Gather Information and to Recall Knowledge in familiar settlements
Unmistakable Lore: Critical failures to Recall Knowledge on a trained Lore are normal failures and critical successes on a Lore with master proficiency provide additional information
Witch's Broom: Can give a broom or similar object a 20' fly Speed for 1 day, or give an existing flying broomstick +10 Speed, during daily prep
Combat
Hit Points: 208 Armor Class: 39 (dexterity (5 max); expert) Class DC: Witch: 36 (intelligence; trained)
Armor: Explorer's Clothing Shield: None Weapons: Crossbow (+29 1d8 P R120'; dexterity; expert); Hair (+29 1d4+4 B; dexterity; expert); Heavy Crossbow (+29 1d10 P R120'; dexterity; expert); Jaws (+28 1d8+4 P; strength; expert); Nails (+28 1d6+4 S; strength; expert); Spiked Gauntlet (+28 1d4+4 P; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Defensive Robes: Defense Expert (Unarmored Defense)
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +5
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +5
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Unconventional Weaponry (Rapier): Weapon Familiarity (Rapier)
Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Witch's Armaments (Eldritch Nails): Nails inflict 1d6 HP slashing
Witch's Armaments (Iron Teeth): Jaws inflict 1d8 HP piercing
Witch's Armaments (Living Hair): Hair inflicts 1d4 bludgeoning
Murksight: Suffers no ranged attack or Perception penalties from non-magical precipitation, and requires no flat check to attack a target concealed by it
Patron's Claim: (2) Familiar makes a R30' attack that inflicts 10d10 HP spirit and drained 2 (save basic Fortitude also negates drained; critical failure inflicts drained 4) and restores 1 Focus Point to self once per hr
Patron's Presence: Familiar can use 2 actions to create a 15' emanation that inflicts stupefied 2 on foes (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts stupefied 3) while sustained for up to 1 min once per hr
Spirit Familiar: (2) Familiar leaves its body, flies 20' to a foe, inflicts 18d6 HP spirit (save basic Will), flies 30' to an ally, and restores HP equal to half the damage dealt once per 10 min
Stitched Familiar: (2) Familiar makes a R30' attack that inflicts 18d6 HP slashing and immobilized for 1 rd (save basic Reflex also negates immobilized) once per 10 min
Sympathetic Strike: (1) Subsequent hit with a Witch's Armament weapon inflicts -1 saves vs. self hexes, or -2 on a critical hit, until the start of the next turn once per rd
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, or +4 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +28 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +29 (dexterity; expert); Will: +30 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Magical Fortitude: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Reflex Expertise: Save Expert (Reflex)
Will Of The Pupil: Save Master (Will)
Bounce Back: (F) Recovery from dying does not increase the wounded condition once per day
Diehard: Remains alive until dying 5
Will Of The Pupil: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Magic
Spell Slots: A10: 2; A1: 4; A2: 4; A3: 4; A4: 4; A5: 4; A6: 4; A7: 4; A8: 4; A9: 4; AC1: 5; D10: 2; D1: 4; D2: 4; D3: 4; D4: 4; D5: 4; D6: 4; D7: 4; D8: 4; D9: 4; DC1: 5; O10: 2; O1: 4; O2: 4; O3: 4; O4: 4; O5: 4; O6: 4; O7: 4; O8: 4; O9: 4; OC1: 5; P10: 2; P1: 4; P2: 4; P3: 4; P4: 4; P5: 4; P6: 4; P7: 4; P8: 4; P9: 4; PC1: 5 Focus Points: 3 Attack: Arcane: +32 (intelligence; legendary); Divine: +32 (intelligence; legendary); Occult: +32 (intelligence; legendary); Primal: +32 (intelligence; legendary) Spell DC: Arcane: 42 (intelligence; legendary); Divine: 42 (intelligence; legendary); Occult: 42 (intelligence; legendary); Primal: 42 (intelligence; legendary)
Spells:
Blood Ward (P1 Foc): (1) R30' Target gains +1 Armor Class and saves vs. a choice of creature type while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 5th gives a +2 bonus)
Cackle (P1 Foc): (F) Sustains an active spell
Clinging Ice (PC1 Foc): (1) R30' Inflicts 1d4 HP cold and -5 Speed while sustained for up to 1 min (save Reflex inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and -10 Speed) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP)
Command (D1): (2) R30' Target obeys a command to approach, run away, drop a held object, drop prone, or stand in place for 1 action (save Will negates; critical failure causes the target to use all actions on its next turn to obey) (heightened 5th affects 10 targets)
Curse Of Death (P5 Foc): (2) R30' Target suffers a curse at stage 1, which inflicts 4d6 HP void and fatigued while sustained for up to 1 min; subsequent failures after 1 rd inflict 8d6 HP void at stage 2, 12d6 HP void at stage 3, and death at stage 4 (save Fortitude inflicts stage 1 with no further progression; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stage 2) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Deceiver's Cloak (P3 Foc): (2) Makes self appear different and gives +24 Deception to avoid uncovering the disguise while sustained up to 1 hr; also disguises voice and scent and allows copying a specific individual (heightened 6th allows copying any creature of the same size)
Discern Secrets (AC1 Foc): (1) R30' Gives +1 on attempts to Recall Knowledge, Seek, or Sense Motive as free actions while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 5th affects 2 targets)
Elemental Betrayal (P1 Foc): (1) R30' Inflicts weakness 2 to a choice of element while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +2 inflicts weakness +1)
Enfeeble (O1): (2) R30' Inflicts enfeebled 2 for 1 min (save Fortitude inflicts enfeebled 1 until the start of the next turn; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts enfeebled 3 for 1 min)
Evil Eye (OC1 Foc): (1) R30' Inflicts sickened 1 that cannot be cured while sustained for up to 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts sickened 2)
Fear (O1): (2) R30' Inflicts frightened 2 (save Will inflicts frightened 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts frightened 3 and fleeing for 1 rd) (heightened 3rd affects 5 targets)
Gust Of Wind (P1): (2) 60' line extinguishes small, non-magical fires, disperses fog, moves light objects, and knocks prone creatures up to Large for 1 rd (save Fortitude prevents moving against the wind but does not knock prone; critical success negates; critical failure pushes 30', knocks prone, and inflicts 2d6 HP bludgeoning)
Life Boost (P1 Foc): (1) R30' Gives fast healing 2 for 4 rd (heightened +1 gives fast healing +2)
Malicious Shadow (P3 Foc): (2) Spell attacks using the target's shadow inflict 1d10+4 HP of a choice of damage type on target each rd while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +2 inflicts +1d10 HP)
Needle Of Vengeance (P1 Foc): (1) R30' Target suffers 2 HP mental (save basic Will) whenever it attacks the named creature while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +1 inflicts +2 HP)
Nudge Fate (OC1 Foc): (1) R30' Gives +1 to make an attack, skill check, or save critical failure into a normal failure or a normal failure into a success within 1 min
Patron's Puppet (A1 Foc): (F) Allows Commanding of familiar at the beginning of a turn
Patron's Puppet (D1 Foc): (F) Allows Commanding of familiar at the beginning of a turn
Patron's Puppet (O1 Foc): (F) Allows Commanding of familiar at the beginning of a turn
Patron's Puppet (P1 Foc): (F) Allows Commanding of familiar at the beginning of a turn
Personal Blizzard (P3 Foc): (1) R30' Conceals the target and inflicts 1d6 HP cold, plus 1d6 HP persistent cold while sustained for up to 1 min (save Fortitude inflicts initial cold only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts 2d6 HP cold and 2d6 HP persistent cold) (heightened +1 inflicts +1 HP initial and persistent, or +2 on a critical failure)
Phase Familiar (A1 Foc): (R) R60' Gives familiar resistance 5 and immunity to precision damage on the triggering damage (heightened +1 gives +2 resistance)
Phase Familiar (D1 Foc): (R) R60' Gives familiar resistance 5 and immunity to precision damage on the triggering damage (heightened +1 gives +2 resistance)
Phase Familiar (O1 Foc): (R) R60' Gives familiar resistance 5 and immunity to precision damage on the triggering damage (heightened +1 gives +2 resistance)
Phase Familiar (P1 Foc): (R) R60' Gives familiar resistance 5 and immunity to precision damage on the triggering damage (heightened +1 gives +2 resistance)
Restorative Moment (P5 Foc): (2) R30' Decreases doomed and drained values by 1 and allows an additional save vs. afflictions once per target per day
Runic Weapon (A1): (2) Touched weapon gains +1 attack and 2 damage dice for 1 min (heightened 6th gives +2 attack; 9th gives +3 attack
Shroud Of Night (OC1 Foc): (1) R30' Inflicts dim vision and concealment of other creatures while sustained for up to 1 min (save Will negates)
Stoke The Heart (DC1 Foc): (1) R30' Gives +2 damage while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +2 gives +1 damage)
Sure Strike (O1): (1) Self uses the better of 2 attack rolls, ignores concealed and hidden conditions, and ignores circumstance penalties on the next Strike in the same turn
Veil Of Dreams (P1 Foc): (1) R30' Inflicts -1 Perception, attacks, and Will saves, -2 vs. sleep, and a DC 5 flat check to use a concentrate action while sustained for up to 1 min (save Will negates flat check; critical success negates)
Wilding Word (PC1 Foc): (1) R30' Target suffers -2 attack and sickened 1 when attacking self while sustained for up to 1 min (save Will (animals, fungi, and plants suffer a -1 penalty) negates sickened; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts sickened 2)
Magic Notes:
Basic Lesson (Dreams): Knows the Veil Of Dreams primal hex
Basic Lesson (Elements): Knows the Elemental Betrayal primal hex
Basic Lesson (Life): Knows the Life Boost primal hex
Basic Lesson (Protection): Knows the Blood Ward primal hex
Basic Lesson (Vengeance): Knows the Needle Of Vengeance primal hex
Cackle: Knows the Cackle primal spell
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Divine; Primal; Occult; Arcane)
Faith's Flamekeeper: Knows the Stoke The Heart and Command divine spells
Faith's Flamekeeper: Spell Trained (Divine)
Greater Lesson (Mischief): Knows the Deceiver's Cloak primal hex
Greater Lesson (Shadow): Knows the Malicious Shadow primal hex
Greater Lesson (Snow): Knows the Personal Blizzard primal hex
Hex Spells: Has a focus pool
Legendary Spellcaster: Spell Legendary (Divine; Primal; Occult; Arcane)
Major Lesson (Death): Knows the Curse Of Death primal hex
Major Lesson (Renewal): Knows the Restorative Moment primal hex
Master Spellcaster: Spell Master (Divine; Primal; Occult; Arcane)
Patron's Gift: Has 1 10th-rank spell slot
Patron's Puppet: Knows the Patron's Puppet divine; primal; occult; arcane spell
Patron's Truth: +1 10th rank spell slot
Phase Familiar: Knows the Phase Familiar divine; primal; occult; arcane spell
Silence In Snow: Knows the Clinging Ice and Gust Of Wind primal spells
Silence In Snow: Spell Trained (Primal)
Spinner Of Threads: Knows the Nudge Fate and Sure Strike occult spells
Spinner Of Threads: Spell Trained (Occult)
Starless Shadow: Knows the Shroud Of Night and Fear occult spells
Starless Shadow: Spell Trained (Occult)
The Inscribed One: Knows the Discern Secrets and Runic Weapon arcane spells
The Inscribed One: Spell Trained (Arcane)
The Resentment: Knows the Evil Eye and Enfeeble occult spells
The Resentment: Spell Trained (Occult)
Wilding Steward: Knows the Wilding Word primal cantrip
Wilding Steward: Spell Trained (Primal)
Witch's Communion: Has increased Witch's Charge effects
Adapted Cantrip: Knows a cantrip from a second tradition
Adaptive Adept: Knows a cantrip or rank 1 spell from a second tradition
Cantrip Expansion: Can prepare 2 additional cantrips each day or add 2 additional cantrips to repertoire
Ceremonial Knife: Can prepare a knife to contain a spell of up to rank 8 during daily prep
Conceal Spell: (1) Casts a subsequent spell without an incantation or obvious manifestations
Counterspell: (R) Expends a spell slot to attempt to counteract a spell with the same spell
Coven Spell: (R) Gives the triggering ally spell a spellshape effect or a damage bonus equal to its rank
Effortless Concentration: (F) Sustains an active spell
Faith's Flamekeeper: Casting or Sustaining a hex gives a target within 15' of familiar 12 temporary Hit Points until the start of the next turn
Hex Focus: Refocus restores all focus points
Hex Master: Can cast multiple hexes per turn, and Cackle Sustains all active hexes
Quickened Casting: (F) Reduces the time required to cast a spell of rank 7 or lower by 1 action once per day
Reach Spell: (1) Extends subsequent spell range by 30'
Reflect Spell: Can cause a successful Counterspell to inflict the spell effects on the caster
Rites Of Convocation: Can use a 10-min process to replace a prepared spell with a summoning spell
Rites Of Transfiguration: Can use a 10-min process to replace a prepared spell of at least 6th rank with Cursed Metamorphosis
Silence In Snow: Casting or Sustaining a hex allows ice to inflict difficult terrain on a 5' square centered on familiar until the start of the next turn
Siphon Power: (F) Can cast a spell from familiar without using a spell slot once per day
Spinner Of Threads: Casting or Sustaining a hex gives a choice of +1 or -1 Armor Class to 1 target within 15' of familiar until the start of the next turn
Split Hex: (1) Subsequent single-target hex, reduced in rank by 2, affects a second target
Starless Shadow: Casting or Sustaining a hex inflicts frightened 1 on a target unaware of adjacent familiar
Steady Spellcasting: Can negate spellcasting disruption with successful DC 15 flat check
The Inscribed One: Casting or Sustaining a hex allows familiar to provide flanking until the start of the next turn
The Resentment: Casting or Sustaining a hex allows prolonging by 1 rd a negative condition affecting a target within 15' of familiar
Widen Spell: (1) Increases the effect of a subsequent 10' or greater radius area instantaneous spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone instantaneous spell by 5', or the effect of a longer line or cone instantaneous spell by 10'
Wilding Steward: Knows a choice of the Summon Animal and Summon Plant Or Fungus primal spells/Casting or Sustaining a hex gives familiar a choice of imprecise scent, tremorsense, and wavesense with a 60' range until the start of the next turn, allowing it to immediately Point Out as a free action
Witch Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the divine; primal; occult; arcane tradition
Witch's Bottle: Can spend 10 min and 1 Focus Point to create a potion that inflicts a hex on the imbiber, lasting until next daily prep
Witch's Charge: Knows the direction, distance, and state of 4 willing targets designated during daily prep, and can cast R30' touch spells on them
Witch's Hut: 1-day ritual creates an animated Huge or smaller dwelling with Armor Class 39, +28 Perception, 60' Speed, 150 Hit Points, and Hardness 10 that can guard, hide, teleport, lock, and move
Notes
Validation Errors:
